about_the_game:
Where am I? Is it a dream? The afterlife? Or just a hallucination? You have a rare chance to experience awakening, navigating the thin line between these realms. Welcome to Sense of Darkness, a virtual reality journey that defies the boundaries of perception and reality.

In this world shrouded in complete darkness, your senses are your guide. Devoid of light, you must rely on touch to navigate through the unknown. As you wander, the environment reveals itself through your interactions, painting a picture of the unseen world around you. With every step and touch, the darkness pulses away to unveil the mysteries it holds.

Sense of Darkness is not just a game; it's an exploration of the senses, a test of courage, and a journey into the depths of the unknown.

Key features include:

  • Immersive VR Experience: Designed exclusively for virtual reality, the game offers unparalleled immersion, allowing you to truly feel and interact with your surroundings.
  • Unique Gameplay Mechanism: Utilize your hands not just as tools, but as keys to unlocking the visual secrets of the dark. Experience the thrill of discovery and the chill of the unknown.
  • Evolving Environments: As you explore, the world around you changes. Each interaction has the potential to alter your path and reveal new secrets.
Are you ready to step into the darkness and discover what lies beyond the veil? Sense of Darkness invites you to embrace the unknown and uncover the secrets that await in the shadows.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 Skylake or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR devices, Oculus SDK, Meta Quest 2, Meta Quest Pro, Meta Quest 3, Oculus Rift S, Oculus Rift

reviews:
“Great experience, great game I didn't have high expectations, but this experience is actually unique. It is interesting and exciting to walk through the dark, to look for the way, to find out where you are, what is happening... A mixture of fascination, curiosity, partly a little scary, partly uncertainty. It's basically an exploration game - you walk, look for the way, scan walls, climb, run, jump, look for switches, smash walls, turn on lights, move stones and much more. and all this in a unique world, where this is only building up from the darkness and slowly revealing itself. The sound is great, the presentation is great! I can recommend this to every VR enthusiast. I don't know anything comparable.”
5 – Wyldbit
